featured.text: Here are a few tips to help us create enduring relationships.
As the key building block for enduring relationships, trust is a bond that evolves as two persons get to know each other and experience safety in opening their hearts.
Thus, it seems the snake is able to endure certain degrees of dehydration in between rains.

definition.en_def: To suffer something painful or difficult patiently; to last or continue over time.
definition.example: She had to endure a long wait at the airport.
